title: About
text:
About this site
What this site is about.

title: Siagro+
text:
Estadisticas de la actividad agropecuaria, desarrollo rural, seguridad alimentaria y nutricional y cambio climático de Centroamérica y México
El Sistema de Información Agropecuaria (SIAGRO) contiene información de variables de la actividad agropecuaria, desarrollo rural, seguridad alimentaria y variables climáticas. Considera once países en su cobertura geográfica: Belice, Costa Rica, Cuba, El Salvador, Guatemala, Haití, Honduras, México, Nicaragua, Panamá y República Dominicana, y contiene datos anuales y mensuales. SIAGRO es impulsado por la Unidad de Desarrollo Agrícola y Cambio Climático en la Sede Subregional en México de la CEPAL. La información se origina en la CEPAL o en otras bases de datos de agencias asociadas, y cada indicador tiene una explicación de su fuente y metadatos.


Statistics on agricultural activity, rural development, food and nutritional security and climate change in Central America and Mexico
The Agricultural Information System (SIAGRO) contains information on agricultural activity, rural development, food security and climate variables. It covers eleven countries: Belize, Costa Rica, Cuba, The Dominican Republic, El Salvador, Guatemala, Haiti, Honduras, Mexico, Nicaragua and Panama, and contains annual and monthly data. SIAGRO is maintained by the Agricultural Development and Climate Change Unit at ECLAC’s Subregional Headquarters in Mexico. The information originates from either ECLAC or other partner agency databases, and each indicator comes with an explanation of its source and metadata.

title: Agricultural activities
text:
Agricultural activity refers to the economic aspects of agriculture and includes data on production, prices, international trade, cultivation and yields, exchange rates, economic activity and public spending.
Content content content

title: Rural development
text: Rural development is directly related to agricultural production since people in rural areas often rely more heavily on agriculture. This section includes data on demographics, education, employment and income, housing and public expenditure and investment

title: Climate data
text:
Climatic variables impact directly on agricultural production. This section includes annual and monthly data on temperature and precipitation at a national level.

title: Food and nutrition security
text: Food and nutrition security refers to not just the supply of food to a population but is also about ensuring availability, stability and access to food. This section contains data on nutritional conditions, availability, access, acceptability, biological utilization and the structural aspects of food and nutrition security.

title: Climate change
text: Climate change can impact on the production potential of all agricultural sectors though the change in both the levels and variability of climate variables. This section includes data on climate variables at a subnational level based on different climate change scenarios.
